description.p: xt7-player-mpv is a rich gui to mpv, written in gambas3.
Is intended to make it easy to maintain and use for GNU/Linux users.

It features a searchable list of local videos,DVDs and video highlights from a number of web sites ,also will provide an infinite internet radio choice, with Shoutcast,Icecast, or your personal choice of podcasts.

che ha anche l'intento di facilitare l'uso delle numerose opzioni di mpv.
Gestisce playlist e libreria, filmati youtube, radio Shoutcast,Icecast, podcast e molto altro.
xt7-player-mpv,o interfata bogata in optiuni pentru mpv, scrisa in gambas3.
Intentioneaza facilitarea intretinerii si folosiri acestuia de catre utilizatori GNU/Linux.
Cauta si incarca playlist-urile audio/video locale si DVD, de asemenea ofera o gama variata de radio prin serviciile de Shoutcast,Icecast, sau colectiile personale Podcast.
